page.title: 04Spring Time
page.content: We have six sheep. One of them is called Grey Face, another is Smokey and the rest are called Curly, Brown Face, Roman Nose I and Roman Nose II. Between them they have had nine lambs. We haven't named them all but we have named three of them and they are called Henry, Sooty and Sweep.The only ones that I can recognise are Henry and Sooty because Sooty is all black and Henry is the only one with a white face. I saw one being born. First came the fluid and then the lamb came. It wasn't a very pretty sight. Its mum licked it as it had been born to get the membrane off. After its mum licked the membrane off,the lamb immediately tried to stand up on its very wobbly legs.
